title: Emerald Kundan Jhumki with South Sea Pearls - ఆకుపచ్చ జుంకీ
features: A fusion of tradition and modern elegance. Features a Polki Kundan diamond stud, followed by cascading layers of emerald beads reminiscent of a 'guttapusalu' design. The base is adorned with delicate Kundan diamond accents and finished with dangling South Sea Pearls. The setting showcases intricate craftsmanship characteristic of Hyderabad jewelry.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for upscale modern events where a touch of traditional South Indian grace is desired.
description: This exquisite Jhumka represents a blend of timeless tradition and contemporary design. The combination of emerald beads, Polki Kundan diamonds, and South Sea pearls creates a captivating contrast, while the Hyderabadi Polish adds a touch of regal splendor. A testament to the artistry of our skilled artisans, this piece is not just jewelry, but a legacy to be cherished.
